summary: Your first day of elementary school.
description: Clutching your new backpack, you walk into the bustling classroom. The teacher, Ms. Davison, smiles warmly. So many new faces!

choices.text: Find an empty desk and sit quietly.
choices.outcomeDescription: You observe everyone from your quiet corner, lost in your thoughts.

choices.text: Try to talk to the kid with the cool dinosaur shirt.
choices.outcomeDescription: You make a new friend, Alex, who also loves dinosaurs!

choices.text: Feel overwhelmed and start to cry.
choices.outcomeDescription: Ms. Davison comforts you, and eventually, the tears stop.

summary: You find a fascinating book in the library.
description: While browsing the library shelves, a dusty old book with strange symbols on its cover catches your eye. It seems to be about ancient myths.

choices.text: Check it out and read it eagerly.
choices.outcomeDescription: The book is filled with captivating stories and expands your imagination.
The librarian smiles and tells you it's a very special collection, guiding you to other interesting reads.

summary: A drawing you made gets you in trouble.
description: You were sketching something rather... suggestive in your notebook during a boring class. Unfortunately, the teacher noticed and confiscated it.

choices.outcomeDescription: The teacher seems skeptical but lets you off with a warning, though your drawing is kept.
You earn a detention slip and a stern lecture about appropriate classroom behavior. Your libido feels a little more validated, though.

choices.text: Feel a wave of intense shame and embarrassment.
choices.outcomeDescription: You can't look anyone in the eye for the rest of the day.

summary: You decide to confess to your crush.
description: Your heart pounds. You've decided today's the day you'll tell [CrushName] how you feel. You find them alone by their locker.

choices.text: Take a deep breath and tell them directly.
choices.outcomeDescription: Their reaction is unreadable at first...

choices.text: Lose your nerve at the last second.
choices.outcomeDescription: You mumble something about the homework and walk away, kicking yourself.

summary: Your crush reacts to your confession.
description: [CrushName] looks surprised, then a slow smile spreads across their face. 'I... I feel the same way,' they admit.

summary: You attend your high school graduation party.
description: Music thumps, and the air is electric with excitement. You've graduated high school! The future feels wide open.

choices.text: Let loose and party hard all night.
choices.outcomeDescription: It's a wild night you'll (mostly) remember. You wake up with a headache but some fun memories.

choices.text: Spend time having meaningful conversations with friends.
choices.outcomeDescription: You share hopes and dreams for the future, strengthening your bonds.

choices.text: Make an appearance and then leave early.
choices.outcomeDescription: You prefer a quiet celebration of your achievement.
